comments: Nembhard (IND) brings his hand toward the ball and marginal contact occurs with Brunson (NYK) as both players extend toward the ball.
Smith (IND) avoids making illegal contact with Hartenstein (NYK) during the tip-in attempt at the basket.
Nesmith (IND) reaches for the ball and makes contact with Brunson's (NYK) arms after his gather, which alters his driving shot attempt in the paint.
Smith (IND) makes contact with the ball prior to it reaching its apex and before it enters the imaginary cylinder above the rim.
DiVincenzo's (NYK) off-arm comes out slightly as he stops his forward momentum and marginal contact occurs with Hield's (IND) side at the end of the drive.
Achiuwa (NYK) rests and promptly removes his hand from Siakam's (IND) side and the contact at the start of the drive is marginal.
Achiuwa (NYK) moves alongside Siakam's (IND) path and absorbs the marginal contact before bringing his hand to the ball and blocking the driving shot attempt.
Achiuwa (NYK) brings his arm up toward the loose ball and marginal contact occurs with Siakam's (IND) right arm during the rebounding opportunity.
While the ball is loose, marginal contact occurs with Siakam's (IND) wrist when Hartenstein (NYK) reaches for the ball.
Siakam's (IND) left arm comes down and incidental contact occurs with his teammate Hield's (IND) head/face during the rebounding opportunity.

Smith (IND) contests Achiuwa's (NYK) tip-in at the basket and makes contact with his head when he follows through. 
 Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Achiuwa (NYK) brings his arm toward the ball and cleanly deflects it away from Siakam (IND) during his drive into the paint.
Siakam (IND) brings his arm toward the ball and marginal contact occurs with Hartenstein's (NYK) arms after the release of his pass.
Nembhard (IND) brings his arm toward the ball and avoids making illegal contact with Brunson (NYK) during his contest of the layup attempt.
Siakam (IND) places and removes his hand from DiVincenzo's (NYK) shoulder at the start of the drive and the contact is marginal.
Hart (NYK) jumps alongside Nembhard (IND) and marginal contact occurs during the driving shot attempt at the basket.
Brunson (NYK) reaches in for the ball and makes contact with Sheppard's (IND) arm, which impacts his ability to release the pass.
Sheppard (IND) brings his arm toward the ball and marginal brush contact occurs with Hartenstein's (NYK) arm prior to the release of the pass.
Siakam (IND) commits a take foul on Brunson (NYK). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Hield (IND) grabs Hart (NYK) around the waist and initiates illegal contact before making contact with the ball.
